Hotel.name: Hilton Istanbul Bomonti Hotel & Conference Center

Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Hilton Istanbul Bomonti Hotel & Conference Center places you in the heart of Istanbul, convenient to Istanbul Cevahir Shopping and Entertainment Centre and Taksim Square. This 5-star hotel is within the vicinity of Galata Tower and Blue Mosque.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 829 guestrooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Cable programming provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an indoor pool, a sauna, and a steam room. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), babysitting/childcare, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, where you can take in a garden view. Snacks are also available at a coffee shop/café.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, a computer station, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Istanbul? This hotel has 129120 square feet (12000 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, where you can take in a garden view. Snacks are also available at a coffee shop/café.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), babysitting/childcare, and gift shops/newsstands.
Make yourself at home in one of the 829 guestrooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Cable programming provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

A stay at Hilton Istanbul Bomonti Hotel & Conference Center places you in the heart of Istanbul, convenient to Istanbul Cevahir Shopping and Entertainment Centre and Taksim Square. This 5-star hotel is within the vicinity of Galata Tower and Blue Mosque.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Istanbul Cevahir Shopping and Entertainment Centre - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Istanbul Military Museum - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Military Museum - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Cemal Resit Rey Concert Hall - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Amerikan Hospital - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Istanbul Lutfi Kirdar Convention and Exhibition Centre - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Trump Towers Istanbul - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Macka Park - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Sadabad Mosque - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Ihlamur Palace - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Taksim Gezi Park - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Taksim Square - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Taksim Republic Art Gallery - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Akbank Culture and Arts Centre - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Ataturk Cultural Center - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi

The preferred airport for Hilton Istanbul Bomonti Hotel & Conference Center is Istanbul (IST-Ataturk Intl.) - 16.1 km / 10 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text: Important notices: In case of any amendment please contact us to check the rates and conditions as these could change - Hotel will invoice the total amount of this booking in case of no show / En caso de modificacion, por favor contacten con nosotros para verificar las tarifas y condiciones de la reserva ya que podrian ser diferentes - En caso de no show el hotel se reserva el derecho de aplicar gastos del 100%
